statements: SELECT * FROM tags;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM tags;
SELECT tag_name, tag_id FROM tags;
SELECT * FROM tags WHERE tag_name = 'example';
SELECT * FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tags WHERE tag_name = 'example';
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_tags FROM tags;
SELECT DISTINCT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_name != 'test' ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id IN (SELECT tag_id FROM other_table);
SELECT * FROM tags WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT tag_name, tag_id FROM tags WHERE tag_id > 1 ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM categories WHERE category_id < 5 ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id > 5 ORDER BY tag_id DESC
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY category_name
SELECT tag_name, category_name FROM tags INNER JOIN categories ON tags.tag_id = categories.category_id
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(*) AS tag_count FROM tags GROUP BY tag_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT category_id, MAX(category_name) AS max_category FROM categories GROUP BY category_id ORDER BY max_category
SELECT * FROM tags LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM fashion_blog_posts WHERE category_id = '12345';
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id = '54321';
SELECT post_title, post_content, tag_name FROM fashion_blog_posts JOIN tags ON fashion_blog_posts.tag_id = tags.tag_id;
SELECT post_id, post_title, category_name FROM fashion_blog_posts JOIN categories ON fashion_blog_posts.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM tags WHERE tag_name = 'Fashion';
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM fashion_blog_posts WHERE post_id = '123456' ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_title, category_name FROM fashion_blog_posts JOIN categories ON fashion_blog_posts.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Style';
SELECT post_id, tag_name FROM fashion_blog_posts JOIN tags ON fashion_blog_posts.tag_id = tags.tag_id WHERE tag_name = 'Trend';
SELECT category_id, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM fashion_blog_posts GROUP BY category_id ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tags;
SELECT tag_name FROM Tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM Categories WHERE category_id = '12345-67890';
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM BlogPosts WHERE category_id = '54321-09876' ORDER BY post_title ASC;
SELECT post_title, tag_name FROM BlogPosts JOIN PostTags ON BlogPosts.post_id = PostTags.post_id JOIN Tags ON PostTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM BlogPosts
SELECT category_name FROM Categories
SELECT tag_name FROM Tags
SELECT post_title, post_content, category_name FROM BlogPosts JOIN Categories ON BlogPosts.category_id = Categories.category_id
SELECT post_title, post_content, tag_name FROM BlogPosts JOIN PostTags ON BlogPosts.post_id = PostTags.post_id JOIN Tags ON PostTags.tag_id = Tags.tag_id
SELECT * FROM tags;
SELECT tag_name, tag_id FROM tags ORDER BY tag_id DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM posts WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT tag_name FROM tags WHERE tag_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT * FROM tags;
SELECT tag_name, tag_id FROM tags WHERE tag_id > 5 ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT post_title, post_content, category_name FROM posts JOIN categories ON posts.category_id = categories.category_id;

SELECT post_title, tag_name, category_name FROM posts JOIN post_tags ON posts.post_id = post_tags.post_id JOIN tags ON post_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id JOIN post_categories ON posts.post_id = post_categories.post_id JOIN categories ON post_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE post_id = 10;

SELECT DISTINCT tag_name, category_name FROM post_tags JOIN tags ON post_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id JOIN post_categories ON post_tags.post_id = post_categories.post_id JOIN categories ON post_categories.category_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY tag_name, category_name DESC;
